thread.title: Sara Mansoor clinches Federal Cup title
thread.title_full: Sara Mansoor clinches Federal Cup title

title: Sara Mansoor clinches Federal Cup title
text:
- Sunday, October 18,   
KARACHI: Top seed Sara Mansoor clinched the title of ladies singles event after thrashing third seed opponent Sarah Mahboob in the summit clash of 30th Federal Cup ranking tennis championships 2015 at Syed Dilawar Abbas Tennis Complex in Islamabad. 

Sara Mansoor proved too good for her final opponent and recorded a straight-set 6-1, 6-3 victory to claim the title and is entitled to receive prize money of Rs25,000 during the closing ceremony of the event on Sunday (today). Sarah Mahboob will cash Rs15,000. 

In boys Under 18 singles event, second seed Hamza Bin Asif clinched the title after beating top seed Barkatullah by 7-6(10), 6-3 score. Hamza will bag Rs12,000 while Barkatullah will take home Rs7,000.
